title: A dyalogue defensyue for women, agaynst malycyous detractoures
author: Burdet, Robert.
publisher: Imprynted by me Robert Wyer, for Rycharde Banckes,
notes: Attributed to Robert Burdet, whose name appears twice in acrostic on A2v.
Edited by Robert Vaughan, whose name appears on A1v.
A reply to "The schole house of women" (STC 12104.5).
Imprint from colophon, which begins: Thus endeth the fawcon and the pye. Anno d[omin]i. 1542.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
